markdownRemark.html:
disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information 💕

go to torproject and download tor

open tor and click the sh🛡eld icon on the top right corner

click Advanced Security Settings...

set ’Security Level’ to ’Safest’

navigate to:

http://darkfailllnkf4vf.onion/

this is an aggregated list of .onion sites

the maintainer of this website is:

twitter.com/DarkDotFail

scroll down to Dreadit, copy and paste the .onion link in a new tab

in the sidebar, after you complete the captcha, click on /d/DarknetMarketNoobs

then, in the sidebar, click on the DNM Bible link

when you’re done and you understand, you’re ready ✨🧚‍♀️
